explains: v. 乱堆，塞满；使（脑子里）塞满（乱七八糟的事）
wordGroup: sea clutter 海面回波；海面干扰

sentences.en: There was a clutter of bottles and tubes on the shelf.
sentences.cn: 架子上胡乱堆满了瓶子和管子。

sentences.en: Caroline prefers her countertops to be clear of clutter.
sentences.cn: 卡罗琳喜欢厨房台面上没有杂乱的东西。

sentences.en: The result was a slash-and-build clutter that got uglier by the year.
sentences.cn: 结果是杂乱的切割和建设，变得越来越难看。
